Name: FORT Redut-M body armor
Description: “Redut M” is a modified version of the Redut well-proven body armor, which is in service of special units of the FSB. The vest is based on advanced technologies in the field of individual armor. Due to the optimized form of armor elements and the outer cover with a special damping-ventilation system, the Redut M armored vest has excellent functional qualities, which facilitates active actions, including those associated with the use of vehicles and in confined spaces.
